# NSScrubberSelectionStyle

**Class**

An abstract class that provides decorative accessory views for selected and highlighted items within a scrubber control.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class NSScrubberSelectionStyle
```

## Overview

Choose a selection style ([doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScrubberSelectionStyle/outlineOverlay] or [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScrubberSelectionStyle/roundedBackground]), or create a custom selection style by subclassing [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScrubberSelectionStyle] and overriding [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScrubberSelectionStyle/makeSelectionView()].

## Using built-in styles

- **outlineOverlay**: A built-in selection style that draws the outline of the scrubber item.
- **roundedBackground**: A built-in selection style that draws a rounded rectangle as the background of the scrubber item.

## Creating a selection style

- **init()**: Initializes a new scrubber selection style.
- **init(coder:)**: Initializes a scrubber selection style when included from a nib or Storyboard.
- **makeSelectionView()**: Provides an opportunity to create a customized scrubber selection style.

## Scrubber items

- **NSScrubberItemView**: An item at a specific index position in the scrubber.
- **NSScrubberArrangedView**: An abstract base class for the views whose layout is managed by a scrubber.
- **NSScrubberImageItemView**: A concrete view subclass for displaying images in a scrubber items.
- **NSScrubberSelectionView**: An abstract base class for specifying the appearance of a highlighted or selected item in a scrubber.
- **NSScrubberTextItemView**: A concrete view subclass for displaying text for an item in a scrubber.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSObjectProtocol
- Sendable
